name: SonicBOT
description: What is the project about? SonicBot Where speed meets precision in the world of DeFi trading. Dive into the future of Telegram sniper bots with our unique blend of meme culture and cutting-edge utility. What makes your project unique? Experience the power of TurboRPC, our proprietary technology that connects directly with miners, ensuring ultra-fast and private transactions. Ready to zoom past the competition? History of your project. Ever felt the need for speed in the DeFi world? Enter SonicBot, the ultimate trading bot that's revolutionizing the crypto space.
